member.name: T:SourceFormatForWeb.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:SourceFormatForWeb.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:SourceFormatForWeb.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.param: whether to apply HTML Encoding to escape angle brackets

member.summary: Guesses programming language from a small predefined set using simple rules. Designed for snippets.
